-e ---

𓏏𓍔 𓍘𓏤 Tiegel (kiln/pestle) ≠ 𓍑 𓍒 𓏙 𓐬 𓐭 𓐢 𓐡 𓍓

Adjectives via suffix -dy gaudy 𒃲𒁲 galdi great(ly) #tizqāru •qāru.tiz
Adjectives via suffix -tive түү -𓍘𓏤 -𓏏𓏮 -𓏏𓍔 prime => primitive
Adjectives via suffix -ty түү -tig -tive -𓍘𓏤 -𓏏𓏮 -𓏏𓍔 -다 high => haughty
Adjectives via suffix -ty 𒋾 -ti -ty -tu 𒇷𒄷𒄭𒋾 lemutti evil sar-u-ti royal √zar
Adjectives via suffix -ty 𒌅 -tu limut-tu 𒅆𒌨𒌅 evil
Adjectives via suffix -ty 𒌓 -tú -tig -tag -dag -day -utu 𒇷𒄷𒄭𒌓 le-mut-tú lemuttú evil
Adjectives via suffix -tis -dis -𒑰 𒊩𒑰 saldis "siegreich" fortis "strong" candidis -ιδος -idos
Adjectives via suffix -tig* 𓇥 𓂋 𓇋 𓂡 kräftig "strong"
Adjectives via suffix -y -ig -ive -𓇋𓇋 -𓏮 fun => funny 一二

күчтүү κρατύς kräftig

Noun suffix 𒌅 TU -ty -tum -tion

-ութիւն -utʿiwn -ություն -utʰjun
-ition *-tyon -ity -ety ty
-𓌙 tion -tang -𓏏𓅱𓍱 -𓏛

𒀊𒁍𒌅 ab-bu-tu fatherhood

𒁉𒊏𒀀𒋾 gaš-ra-a-ti gross(artig)/great
𒈠𒀠𒅗𒀀𒋾 ma-al-ka-a-ti markant √malik
𒄷𒄭𒋰𒁉𒆷𒀜 mut-tab-bi-la-at metal-bearing (wielding weapons)

-地 de/dì -的 de/dì/dí
-दार (-dār) adjective-forming suffix, denoting "having, possessing" ⇔ do
DE = VON

(female) Noun suffix
-ity tranquil => tranquility, obscure obscurity
-th heal heil حال health healthy < hale, whole
-ate derive => derivate -ātus, -āta, -ātum tum
-tse @ Tocharian -cce -ce -que -ique -ig -ich <?> lich like -ka @Tocharian
-त्व -tva: गुरु (guru, “grave, heavy” → गुरुत्व (gurutva, “gravity, heft”
-𒋾 ter ture tion 𒁴 -tim ⋍ 𒌈 -tum -dom
-𒋾 tieh ⋍ heit reverse :
𒅅𒇷𒋾 (dun)ek-le-ti dunkelheit 𓎡 𓎡 𓇰 darkness

Middle English -th, -t, from Old English -þ, -t, -þu, -tu, -þo, -to “-th”, abstract nominal suffix), from Proto-Germanic *-iþō, from Proto-Indo-European *-iteh₂. Cognate with Scots -th, West Frisian -te, Dutch -te, Danish -de, Swedish -d, Icelandic -ð, -d, Gothic -𐌹𐌸𐌰 (-iþa), Latin -itās “-ty, -ity”. See -ity, -t.

Used to form nouns from verbs of action:
berth, birth, blowth, drawth, flowth, growth, sight, spilth, stealth, theft, weight

Used to form nouns from adjectives:
breadth, coolth, dampth, dearth, depth, filth, health, height/heighth, length, roomth, ruth, strength, troth, truth, sloth/slowth, warmth, wealth, width, wrath, wrength, youth/youngth

Soft S/G -us -ish -isch -ig affix:
𐌰𐍆𐌲𐌿𐌸𐍃 abguƌs off-guƒs abgöttig/abgöttisch
𐌰𐍆𐌷𐌰𐌹𐌼𐌴𐌹𐍃 abḫaιmeιs abheimig/abheimisch
𐌱𐌰𐌹𐍂𐌷𐍄𐍃 bright(ish/ig)
𐌲𐌰𐌽𐍉𐌷𐍃 genuḫs genug! enough (𐌷𐍃=g whichever provides it)

Noun gerund suffix -ing: dancing as prefix 𒉆 nam... ⋍ im Tanze

𒀀𒋾 suggest old reading ment > matter, manner

𓍯 𓄿 𓈐 | far | 𒊒 𒆪𒌋𒋾 ru-ku-u-ti ⇔ 𒊒𒁺 rukub 𓃭 𓏤 𓎡 𓄿 𓃀 𓌝 ride

𓎛 𓈎 𓂋 𓅪 hunger
